snippet: Big-hitting John Isner and fellow American Steve Johnson did not allow long periods of rain, drizzle and mist to derail their advance at the weather-hit Western & Southern Open in Cincinnati on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Big-hitting John Isner and fellow American Steve Johnson did not allow long periods of rain, drizzle and mist to derail their advance at the weather-hit Western & Southern Open in Cincinnati on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Isner, Johnson Lead U.S. Advance at Rainy Cincinnati
headline.main: Isner, Johnson Lead U.S. Advance at Rainy Cincinnati
